responses: Chao ban, toi co the giup gi cho ban ?
Tam biet ban, co van de gi thi nhan minh
Toi rat vui khi duoc giup ban

patterns: toi muon hoi ve tu the choi bida
responses: Chan va hai vai rong bang nhau; Chan tru buoc ve phia truoc 1 buoc; Cam gay song song voi mat ban; Mat nhin thang

patterns: cach giu co khi choi bida
responses: Tay cam luc vua phai, khong cam chat hay long qua, chi khi nao danh moi siet chat tay.

patterns: toi muon hoi ve cach ngam bong chuan
responses: Nhin bao quat cac vien bi tren ban. Mat nhin vao vien bi chu can danh de xac dinh luc. Duong di cua vien bi chu phai hop thanh 1 duong thang.

patterns: cach tro thanh nguoi choi chuyen nghiep
toi muon thanh nguoi choi chuyen nghiep
responses: Giao luu voi nhieu nguoi choi khac de co kinh nghiem
Hoc hoi tu nhung nguo choi gioi hon

patterns: choi bida gom nhung cong cu nao
nhung cong cu khi choi bida
responses: Gang tay; Ban va bi; Gay bida

patterns: nen chon gang tay the nao khi choi bida
responses: Tham hut mo hoi trong qua trinh choi
Tang do bam tren gay Bida
Giam ma sat giua tay va gay danh bida

patterns: nen chon ban choi the nao
responses: Loai pho bien hien nay la Ban bida lo. Loai ban nay co 3 kich thuoc: 7 feet, 8 feet va 9 feet. Neu choi tại gia thi ban co kich thuoc 7 – 8 feet la rat phu hop,  9 feet thuong su dung tai cac CLB lon

patterns: nen chon gay choi the nao
responses: Nen chon gay chac chan, thuong lam bang go là tot nhat. Bot xoay giup cho dau gay dat chuan trong moi cu danh.
